p: Hence, the produced BBE presents itself as a compatible system able to be administrated to the buccal mucosa, avoiding discomfort during the administration, since that the buccal mucosa has a pH range between 5.5 and 7.0, fluctuating according to the salivation flow rate [ 35]. In addition, it is possible that the use of preservatives and antioxidants in the emulsion prevented the microbial contamination and chemical degradation of emulsion components, which could lead to considerable pH decrease [ 17].
